settings.title: Settings
settings.host_pattern: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
settings.host_format: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
settings.choose_the_ldap_domain_to_authenticate_u: Choose the LDAP domain to authenticate users
settings.lemonldapng_fqdn_tooltip: The hostname (FQDN) of the lemonldapng webapp, can be set only once, use lemonldapng UI to change it
settings.sample_apps_enabled_tooltip: Enable or disable the sample applications for demonstration and testing purposes.
settings.saml_status_tooltip: SAML (Security Assertion Markup Language) is a protocol that allows users to authenticate once and access multiple services through Single Sign-On (SSO). It enables identity federation by exchanging authentication and authorization data between an identity provider (IdP) and service providers (SPs) using XML-based messages.
settings.cda_status_tooltip: CDA (Cross Domain Authentication) is a mechanism that allows Single Sign-On (SSO) across different domains. It works by securely sharing authentication information between portals using redirection and encrypted tokens, enabling seamless access across multiple web domains.
settings.ldap_domain_format: Must be a valid LDAP domain name
